content: यु {vI.v} {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (यौति, युत; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} यावयति; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} यियविषति or युयूषति) {@--1@} To join, unite. {@--2@} To mix, combine. {vII.v} {c3c} <ab>P.</ab> (युयोति) To detach, separate; as in युतसिद्ध {vIII.v} {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> (युनाति, युनीते) {@--1@} To bind, fasten. {@--2@} To join, unite. {@--3@} To mix, combine. {@--4@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To give, grant. {@--5@} To acquire. {@--6@} To worship, respect. {vIV.v} {c10c} <ab>A.</ab> (यावयते) To censure. --WITH व्यति to mix; अन्योन्यं स्म व्यतियुतः शब्दाञ् शब्दैस्तु भीषणान् <ls>Bk. 8. 6.</ls>
